code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Table=_ref=>{let{contracts}=_ref;const riskColor=risk=>{switch(risk){case"High":return"bg-red-100 text-red-700";case"Medium":return"bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-700";case"Low":return"bg-green-100 text-green-700";default:return"bg-gray-100 text-gray-700";}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overflow-x-auto rounded-lg shadow border",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"w-full border-collapse",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{className:"bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 text-left text-gray-600",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 text-left text-gray-600",children:"Parties"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 text-left text-gray-600",children:"Expiry"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 text-left text-gray-600",children:"Status"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"p-3 text-left text-gray-600",children:"Risk"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:contracts.map(c=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"border-b hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-3 font-medium text-blue-600 hover:underline",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contracts/".concat(c.id),children:c.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-3",children:c.parties}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-3",children:c.expiry}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-3",children:c.status}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"p-3 font-semibold ".concat(riskColor(c.risk)),children:c.risk})]},c.id))})]})});};export default Table;
